title: Virtual Order Assistant
job_overview:
Looking for reliable VA's to help US-based customers with placing food orders using provided tools we give you. If you’re tech-savvy, fast with computers and helping people, then I guarantee this is the #1 paying job than any other employer can offer you on this platform.

Requirements:

Must be fluent in English
Must have a Windows Desktop (Not a laptop)
Minimum of 16GB ram
Good typing speed
Good internet speed
Must have the Upgrade to see actual info app.

Paid Training, more information provided after applying!

Note: Full time only

Gamers preferred! (Multi-tasking, fast typing, helps a lot)
